channel.title: Animations breaking on Decompile.
channel.description:
I just thought I would start a seperate thread for this as ive been unable to find a solution to my problem.
I wish to rig my hand model onto the BM view models for the mod Black-Mesa: Insecurity and ive run into a problem, when I decompile BM's view models the animations break! the hand models animations don't function correctly and their origin is offset massively as seen here:
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
Does anyone know what causes this? ive tried several different versions of mdldec and all have had the same result. I really need help guys either a solution or maybe a BM dev can give me the source files? (wishfull thinking perhaps).
If someone has a solution and wants to rig and compile the models for us then they will get full credit in BMI but I will settle simply for a fix or the unbroken source files. We need you guys!!! :'(
